title: Captain Morgans Black Spiced Rum label fonts
content:
I'm looking for the fonts that make up the Captain Morgans Black Spiced Label. Particularly the "Spiced Rum" - a cut of baskerville? And the blacklettering of "Black"  
Identity of all fonts including the script writing would be gratefully received!

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-01%20at%2017_5592.59.44.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/The-O-Group_Captain-Morgan-Black-Spiced-Rum_02_6620.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-02-01 at 17.59.44.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-01%20at%2017.59.44.png) | 462.08 KB |
| [The-O-Group\_Captain-Morgan-Black-Spiced-Rum\_02.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/typophile.com/files/The-O-Group_Captain-Morgan-Black-Spiced-Rum_02.jpg) | 111.86 KB |
author: cobelli

comments.content:
Aaaargh me hearty, ye have yer Old English for \_Black\_ [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/old-english/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/old-english/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/old-english/") This one be ornamented with cutlash swipes and some variation in detail.  
More  
Plain Black  
 [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/PlainBlack](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/PlainBlack "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/PlainBlack")  
Don

Simplified version by David Quay, originally for Letraset  
IC Agincourt  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/agincourt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/agincourt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/agincourt/")

And for SPCIED RUM, blurry image so can't check the R -- leg join to bowl -- in proper detail, but overall, the letters look like Engravers Roman Bold  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/engravers-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002622/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/engravers-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/engravers-lt/")  
Don
Great, they're perfect. Thank you so much!
